full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,STON PA MNYAM MED SH'AKYA THUB PA'I SGRUB THABS LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (STON PA MNYAM MED SH'AKYA THUB PA'I SGRUB THABS LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD LDAN SLOB BU 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR RIGS SMRA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN BRIS PA'O, ,YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON RNAM DPYOD DANG LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG BADZRA GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHES PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
